      public Map<String,String> requestServerInfo(String defaultIP, int defaultPort)
      Description copied from interface: UI
      Requests the user to input the server information to connect.
      Specified by:
      requestServerInfo in interface UI
      Parameters:
      defaultIP - the default IP to connect to.
      defaultPort - the default port to connect to.
      Returns:
      A Map containing both the IP and the Port in a string format. Their keys are respectively "IP" and "port".

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      winner - the tower color of the winner of thi match.
      winners - the nicknames of the winners of this match.
      losers - the nicknames of the losers of this match.

    • selectStudentFromContainer

      private int selectStudentFromContainer(RequestParameter type, int characterID)
      Returns the ID of a student chosen from the container specified by the parameters
      Parameters:
      type - of student container the student is being selected from, can be entrance, dining room or empty if the container in question is a character.
      characterID - the ID of the character from which the student is being selected. -1 if the container is not a character
      Returns:
      the ID of the selected student

    • selectIslandTileFromIdx

      private int selectIslandTileFromIdx()
      Asks for the user to select an island group by typing its index, then returns the first tile's ID in that group
      Returns:
      the ID of an island tile contained by the selected island group

    • selectColor

      private Color selectColor()
      Asks for the user to select a student color from all the possible values
      Returns:
      selected color

    • characterStringShort

      private String characterStringShort(int ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - of the character to display the info of
      Returns:
      a string with the character ID and cost and, if applicable, the students, no entry tiles and uses left.

    • characterStringDetailed

      private String characterStringDetailed(int ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - of the character to display the info of
      Returns:
      a string with the character ID and cost and, if applicable, the students, no entry tiles and uses left.
